home.title: VibeMCP.net - The Vibe-First MCP Platform
home.description: Discover, deploy, and manage Model Context Protocol servers with enterprise-grade solutions.

mcpHub.title: MCP Hub - Discover 865+ Model Context Protocol Servers
mcpHub.description: Explore our comprehensive database of {{count}}+ Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers from GitHub. Find, filter, and connect with MCP servers for AI applications. Browse by categories, languages, and popularity.
mcpHub.heading: Discover All MCP Servers
mcpHub.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive database of {{count}}+ MCP servers from GitHub. Find, filter, and connect with the perfect MCP server for your AI applications and workflows.
mcpHub.loadMore: Scroll down to load more servers automatically

remoteMcp.title: Remote MCP Services - Hosted Model Context Protocol Servers
remoteMcp.description: Connect to public remote MCP servers instantly. No setup required - access third-party GitHub, Atlassian, and other integrations for AI applications. Browse curated directory of reliable services.
remoteMcp.heading: Remote MCP Services
remoteMcp.subtitle: Connect to public remote MCP servers instantly. No setup required - just copy the URL and start using powerful integrations in your AI conversations.

atlassian.title: Atlassian MCP Server
atlassian.description: Connect to Jira, Confluence, and other Atlassian services with full API access

github.title: GitHub MCP Server
github.description: Full GitHub API access for repositories, issues, and workflows

aws.title: AWS MCP Server
aws.description: Comprehensive AWS services integration for cloud infrastructure management

howToConnect.title: How to Connect
howToConnect.subtitle: Get started with Remote MCP servers in just 3 simple steps

step1.title: Copy Server URL
step1.description: Select your desired MCP server and copy the provided connection URL

step2.title: Configure Claude
step2.description: Add the URL to your Claude Desktop app configuration file

step3.title: Start Using
step3.description: Restart Claude and start using the MCP server features in your conversations

privateMcp.title: Private MCP Services - Enterprise Model Context Protocol Solutions
privateMcp.description: Deploy private MCP servers with enterprise-grade security. Full control, custom configuration, and seamless integration with your existing infrastructure. Coming Q2 2025.
privateMcp.heading: Private MCP Services
privateMcp.subtitle: Deploy and manage your own private MCP servers with enterprise-grade security, full control, and seamless integration with your existing infrastructure.
privateMcp.comingSoonSubtitle: We're building the ultimate private MCP platform for enterprises who need complete control over their AI infrastructure.

privateDeployment.title: Private Deployment
privateDeployment.description: Deploy MCP servers in your own cloud or on-premises infrastructure with complete data sovereignty and security control.

customConfiguration.title: Custom Configuration
customConfiguration.description: Configure MCP servers to integrate seamlessly with your existing systems, APIs, and enterprise applications.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.description: Advanced user management, role-based access control, and detailed audit logs for enterprise compliance.

architecture.title: Hybrid Cloud Architecture
architecture.description: Deploy across multiple cloud providers or on-premises

earlyAccess.title: Be Among the First
earlyAccess.description: Join our early access program and get exclusive previews of Private MCP features, plus special pricing for early adopters.
